security: Releasing the fact that the CIA is actively tracing former Cuban citizens could compromise current or future intelligence operations. Specifically, the request for 'traces on former Cuban citizen Evelio Duque Miyar' implies an ongoing intelligence interest in individuals with Cuban connections. Sharing this could alert potential targets and compromise intelligence gathering efforts.
summary: A cable from Guayaquil requests traces on former Cuban citizen Evelio Duque Miyar, who may have been involved in Cuban operations in the Miami area during the early 1960s.
summary_one_paragraph: On February 27, 1978, a SECRET cable (Guayaquil 22049) was sent from Guayaquil to the Director and INFO to LA (Miami) and Quito, requesting traces on Evelio Duque Miyar, a former Cuban citizen approximately 50 years old and formerly a resident of Camaguey Provence. The cable suggests that Miyar was possibly involved in Cuban operations in the Miami area during the early 1960s. The request indicates that there is no file or identifying information (E2, IMPDET) readily available on Miyar.
title: Request for Traces on Evelio Duque Miyar
